translation.Message_0_Page_0: Pleased to meet you <name_char>. You're welcome here any time, just keep in mind this is a civilized outpost, and we will not tolerate any disturbances!
translation.Message_0_Page_1: We're a rag tag group of survivors formed in the beginning of the outbreak called the <color=legendary>Unyielding</color>. Our plan here is to colonize as many survivors as we can so we can try to survive this outbreak together!
